dcterms:creator: H. Duan
G. Zhai
X. Min
Y. Zhu
Y. Fang
X. Yang
dcterms:description: The OIQA Database contains 320 distorted 360-degree images, obtained by applying 4 distortion types with 5 levels to 16 raw 360-degree images. The distortion types include JPEG compression, JPEG2000 compression, Gaussian blur, and Gaussian white noise. Mean opinion score (MOS) values of distorted 360-degree images range from 1 to 10.
dcterms:title: OIQA Database

dcterms:creator: W. Sun
K. Gu
S. Ma
W. Zhu
N. Liu
G. Zhai
dcterms:description: The CVIQD Database collects 528 compressed 360-degree images generated from 16 lossless source images. It considers three compression distortion types: JPEG, H.264/AVC, and H.265/HEVC. The MOS values of distorted 360-degree images are normalized and rescaled to the range [0, 100].
dcterms:title: CVIQD Database
